verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Do you really care?
Do you know how to share
With people everywhere?

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Do you really care?
Will you take the dare?
Spread Good News everywhere?
The cross of Christ to bear?
Do you really care?

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I look around in the place that I live;
I see people with so much to give;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Yet there are those who are dying to know
Just that somebody cares.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I see people just longing to know
What they can live for and where they can go;
We have the hope and the puspose to share,
But, do we really care?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
People grope in darkness,
Searching for a way,
Don't you know of someone
You can help today?
